favourite.article: Dear Savior Thou art mine! Lord keep softening my heart that You can save me in Yourself afresh. Every day You're my dear Savior! Oh MY Savior!
What a blessing this hymn has been to me. I sing it in the midnight hours when I can't sleep and it brings me such comfort.
The lyrics exactly expresses how I feel. Besides, the tune is catchy and the rhythm so full of joy.

This is such a sweet hymn penned by the authors. It shows how they, and we need to have such an intimate relationship with our dear Lord. He is truly ours and we are His now and for eternity! Praise Him for His faithfulness in pardoning us for all of our sins and offenses. Yet, time after time, He still accepts us just as we are.
This is the hymn that the Lord Jesus desires!
What a change to hear a hymn played as it should be!
